front.title: Internet General Packet Radio Service (IGPRS); Service description

abstract.t: We propose an architecture (IGPRS) for the integration of the IPv6 protocol in the GPRS infrastructure. The data and signalling protocol suite will be based on mobile IPv6 protocol (instead of the GTP protocol). This new infrastructure will take advantage of the available internet protocols for routing and security. Since it is targetted to co-exist with the GPRS, it is a partial translation of MAP specifications to Internet protocols. This document uses some of the GPRS Service document and some of its terminology.
